metadata.title: CVE-2018-12931 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: ntfs_attr_find in the ntfs.ko filesystem driver in the Linux kernel 4.15.0allows attackers to trigger a stack-based out-of-bounds write and cause adenial of service (kernel oops or panic) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted ntfs filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-09-06').
linux-aws package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-09-06').
